All functions in this folder were downloaded
from the MathWorks File Exchange.

- altmany-export_fig ...: https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/23629-export-fig
- extrema: https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/12275-extrema-m--extrema2-m
- peakfinder: https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/25500-peakfinder-x0--sel--thresh--extrema--includeendpoints--interpolate-
- vlookup: copycat of Excel function
